reviews.review: This game is by far one of if not the best first person shooters i have ever played, even multiple years after its release, this game holds up as an immersive masterpiece, 10/10 would reccomend.

This game sucks. This game is only an improvement to the original half-life in a graphical sense. This is, by far, the worst game I have played so far. I've even played Half-Life: Source and I'd rather do that than play this piece of shit game. The only reason why I'm even keeping this downloaded is because of Garry's Mod.

Half life 2 is one of the best games I have ever played. The way it tells its story as well as the combat and puzzle solving are very close to perfection. 9 out of 10 crowbars, would recommend to almost everyone

J U E G A S O

Легендарное продолжение, стандарт всем шутерам, халфа вторая закрепила в себе отличный сюжет, динамичный геймплей и качественную проработку, благодаря чему не с проста многими критиками и игроками объявлена лучшей игрой десятилетий. Мне лишь остается подтвердить ее статус, порекомендовав случайному читателю моего монолога.
muito bom esse jogo fiquei todo cagado na cidade cheia de zumbis

Half-Life 2 is an undeniable classic that holds up very well in this day and age. the combat, weapons, and movement are overall an improvement over the first game's system, which was already good. The story and characters feel fleshed out, and the lore is expanded upon well. 9/10 Would Recommend
лучшая игра. Перепроходил 15 раз на пиратке и вот купил прохожу дальше всем советую
v社的游戏总能给我一种工业美感，还有对科技与未知的不懈探索。这是一批90年代前成长起来的游戏制作者，我们借此可以一窥冷战时期美国的科技辉煌。也只有那个时期的美国能孕育这样的游戏公司吧。

Half-Life 2 è a mio avviso, l'fps più importante nella storia, non ha solo rivoluzionato quindi l'fps ma anche le tecniche dello sviluppo video ludico...
Non ero ancora nato quando lo rilasciarono, ma so di certo che case di produzione di giochi AAA, al giorno d'oggi, faticano a creare giochi così importanti come questo.

Half Life 2 is a sci fi action game revolving around scientist, Gordon Freeman. Half Life 2 has an excellent story with many unforgettable moments. Half Life 2 is a single player title which can also be played offline if you want (expect you won’t earn achievements). Half Life 2 had stunning graphics in 2004 when it released and it still holds up graphically today! Sure, it doesn’t look as good as Miles Morales, but it is definitely playable graphically. The combat is fun, with multiple different ways approach each situation. Whether you go in guns blazing, or slicing zombies in half. Half Life 2 has a great price of only $15 and can run on pretty much any pc you may have. Half Life 2 is in my opinion one of valve’s biggest successes and should be played by an older audience. 10/10
